title: Ripple eyes $3 surge amid Solana rise, AI altcoin buzz
description: Ripple (XRP) is on the brink of a $3 surge as it navigates through legal challenges. This is amid a broader banking revolution, growing interest in Solana (SOL), and the emerging AI-focused altcoin, InQubeta (QUBE). Despite regulatory hurdles, XRP's potential growth is buoyed by the crypto market's expansion and innovations in AI and blockchain scalability. #partnercontent

title: Revolutionizing Cross-Chain Transactions: Coreum’s XRPL Bridge Enables Seamless XRP Integration with EVM and Cosmos Chains
description: Coreum has launched an upgraded XRPL bridge, allowing users to seamlessly move XRP into Coreum, the Cosmos ecosystem and dozens of networks built on the Ethereum Virtual Machine. The bridge was launched in 2022 but had limited capabilities—users could only transfer COREUM tokens across the two networks. By last December, over 37 million COREUM tokens [...]
